queryHandle.description: Query handle to get information about (from wit-get-work-items-by-query-wiql with returnQueryHandle=true)

detailed.description: Include detailed validation data and selection analysis (default false for concise output)

includePreview.description: Include preview of first 10 work items with their context data (default true)

includeStats.description: Include staleness statistics and analysis metadata (default true)

includeExamples.description: Include selection examples showing how to use itemSelector (default false, saves ~300 tokens)

oneOf.description: Select all items (for selection analysis when detailed=true)

itemSelector.description: Optional: When provided with detailed=true, shows selection analysis

previewCount.description: Number of items to preview in selection analysis (default 10)

includeSampleItems.description: Fetch and include sample items from ADO API when detailed=true (default false)

title: wit-query-handle-info
description: üîç UNIFIED HANDLE INFO: Get comprehensive information about a query handle in one call. Default mode provides inspection data (work item preview, statistics, selection hints). With detailed=true, adds validation data and optional selection analysis. Replaces separate validate/inspect/select tools for simpler workflows.
